# classAttributes

**Instance Property**

The class attributes associated with the filter.

## Declaration

```swift
var classAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any] { get set }
```

## Discussion

For more information about class attributes for a filter, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/GraphicsImaging/Conceptual/CoreImaging/ci_intro/ci_intro.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP30001185] and the filter attributes key constants defined in [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class].
